snippet: We are reaching end times for Western affluence. We must accept economic honesty and recognize that promises made during good times can no longer be easily kept.
abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Stephen D King warns economic trends suggest that the golden age of Western economic growth is over; holds policymakers in the West must accept the reality and recognize that promises made during more affluent times can no longer be easily kept.
lead_paragraph: We are reaching end times for Western affluence. We must accept economic honesty and recognize that promises made during good times can no longer be easily kept.
